name: Camp Hickory Hill
description: Camp Hickory Hill is a summer camp for diabetic children. I was asked to update an app that monitor the food taken by the children and add new features as well. This was a native android application backed by Firebase.
title: Android Developer

name: Herth
description: Herth is ushering in a new age of 3D visualization by redefining the way media is captured, processed, and disseminated. They're focused on using CV to train algorithms for automated furniture staging, depth estimation,  and object detection within domestic spaces. I was contacted by them to create a file format converter. The engine they use, PlayCanvas, lack a FBX converter for their JSON file format. The one I built for them was a mix of C++ for the converter and Python for the CLI.
title: Software Engineer
